title: Football
summaries: The Football is a novelty item that players can throw to each other, or to themselves. It is sold by the Party Girl for 20, after the player has accumulated a golf score of at least 501.
Holding the Football and pressing ⚒ Use / Attack throws the Football. It can then be "caught" and picked up again, even while in flight, by another player, or by the same player.

A player who takes any damage while a Football is anywhere in their inventory will automatically drop the Football, and it can again be picked up by another player, or by the same player. If multiple Footballs are in the player's inventory at the time, they all drop.

statistics.Buy: 20
statistics.Sell: 4
